body.name: EDJO Wireless Ergonomic Mouse, 2.4GHz Wireless Vertical Mouse, Horizontal Scroll Wheel, 7 Buttons, 3 DPI Adjustable, Quiet Clicks, Compatible with Windows/Mac OS, PC, Computer, Desktop, Notebook
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 2 hrs 13 mins
features: ✅ Ergonomic Design & Skin-Friendly Materials: The EDJO wireless vertical mouse is ergonomically designed which can reduce hand and wrist fatigue caused by prolonged mouse use, protect your wrists from injury. This wireless mouse also uses skin-friendly materials, anti-sweat, anti-slip and anti-fingerprints.

✅ USB + Type C Interface & 33ft Wireless Range: This mouse comes with USB+Type C dual interface, compatible with more devices, plug and play, no need to install any software. 2.4GHz wireless technology, stable connection without delay, wireless distance up to 33ft.

✅ Horizontal Scroll Wheel & Side Buttons: The EDJO wireless ergonomic mouse with an aluminum alloy horizontal scroll wheel that can scroll your computer page horizontally, It can greatly improve your work efficiency. The ergonomic mouse also has the forward and back buttons allow you to switch pages easily.

✅ 3 Levels DPI & 50 Million Click Life: EDJO wireless vertical mouse with 3 DPI (800/1200/1600) adjustable, you can adjust the DPI to get your favorite mouse movement speed! The wireless mouse also with perfect performance for more than 50,000,000 keystrokes!

✅ 18 Months Battery Life & Power Saving Mode: EDJO wireless ergonomic mouse has an auto-sleep function, If the wireless mouse stops working for more than 8 minutes, it will automatically enter the dormant state to save power, click on any button to activate it again, this automatic power saving feature allows one battery to last up to 18 months.

✅ Universal Compatibility & Wide Use: EDJO optical vertical mouse is compatible with Windows 11, 10, 8.1, 8, 7, XP, Vista, Linux, Chromebook, Mac OS, Surface Pro, Surface, and Any Device with USB Port or Type C Port. As well as compatible for PC, Laptop, MacBook, iPad and more.
✅ 18 Months free replacement, contact EDJO for any help/replacement.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 54 ratings 4.5 out of 5 stars

productInformation.name: Special Feature
productInformation.value: Wireless, Portable, 4 Way Scrolling, Ergonomic Design

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I love this mouse! Has the functionality of a much more expensive one, and I absolutely love the USB connector in that you can use USB C or regular. The dongle also fits into the mouse for easy transport. Love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It takes some getting used to
reviews.reviewText: I have had carpal tunnel surgery and thought this mouse would help since when I use a regular mouse, my wrist rests on the scar and slightly numbs my hand. I have been trying to get used to using it, but it has been taking a while to remember which way my hand needs to be on there. After a while, things feel comfortable and my hand naturally settles into position. The buttons are easy to use and there are extra buttons for gaming.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quite comfortable and light enough for daily use.
reviews.reviewText: Not sure how long the battery life is as i haven't needed to replace the batteries yet (2 months).The only real complaints i have is that I'm always finding my pinky finger bunching up with my other fingers and not having a place to rest, if this mouse had a pinky rest i wouldn't even complain. This mouse will go inactive after about 30ish minutes of idle. When it does i have to wake it by clicking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works well with my laptop, easy to use and comforms to hand with ease. Glad I made this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very nice mouse
reviews.reviewText: I have been trying out this new mouse for a week and really impressed with its performance. The sensitivity is top-notch, providing smooth and precise control which is great for both everyday use and gaming. And of course, stress free for my wrist. I Highly recommend this for anyone looking for a reliable and responsive mouse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent mouse, requires a battery.
reviews.reviewText: Overall a decent ergonomic mouse. Seems to work well. I didn't like that it takes a battery, but I used a rechargeable AA. I've used better mice at this price point that had a built in battery, but this is still pretty good and hasn't given me any issues as of yet, which some of those started giving me issues with the scroll wheel after a few days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I highly recommend this mouse!!
reviews.reviewText: This mouse is the most comfortable I've ever used till now. My wrist always used to hurt with others but with this one my wrist never hurt. It was designed to for the most suitable shape for your hand so it prevents wrist pain even if you use it for a long time. There are also various functions, so you don't have to touch the computer keyboard. The design is so pretty too! I highly recommend this mouse to anyone looking for a new one

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This one is too small for my hands I wouldn’t say that I have gigantic hands but I can’t use it efficiently also it has a slow drag when using it
